alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 24 at 1:51PM CST until November 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains in Texas. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.
